content:
Just found out about and AI that will remove those content you don't want on your feed.

Like if you don't want fighting videos on youtube feed, then just describe it and it will remove it.
Its:
https://www.flowstate.cc/

demo : https://x.com/roroathreya/status/1932707499049963867?t=yRY14YibcNSs55WVbOZvOw&s=19
I just wish you youtube could figure out which videos I have already watched and now show them. Also stop recommending things from six years ago.

I have my YouTube history set to scrub after 3 months, which I think is why I keep seeing old suggestions
However, those old videos do still retain my likes, so it's mostly the suggestion system only using the last 3 months of my activity, not actually scrubbing data after 3 months

Yes, I believe YouTube does not suggest videos from the distant past; but, if I give a child my phone and he/she view any CocoMelon videos, I will receive video suggestions for the next three days.
i wish they exapnd more platform.

I get suggestions for things I watched yesterday or last week. In some cases this is frustrating. For example some channels are basically captured streams from tiktok or twitch and they all have the same or similar title. If I want to catch up on old streams it would be great if youtube didn't reccomend the ones I already watched on youtube.
